full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PHYI SGRUB LA BSTOD PA, 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO LA BSTOD PA BDUD DPUNG 'JOMS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
